definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
(coll.) to cling to sb influential or famous

sentences.english: There are welts on my thighs from Jason’sbelt.
sentences.chinese: 我的大腿上都是杰森用皮带打的印子。

sentences.english: People are clapping, slapping their thighs, stomping the floor.
sentences.chinese: 人们鼓掌，拍着大腿，跺着地板。

sentences.english: Keep legs straight and move thighs back.
sentences.chinese: 保持双腿伸直，大腿向后方移动。

sentences.english: I brush some potato-chip crumbs off my lap.
sentences.chinese: 我把薯片屑从我大腿上擦掉。

sentences.english: Uncle John immediately began applying his hand to my bare bottom and thighs .
sentences.chinese: 约翰叔叔很快开始用他的手打我的光屁股和大腿。

sentences.english: Larger muscle groups are thighs, back, and chest.
sentences.chinese: 大肌肉群在大腿，胸和背等部位。

sentences.english: Contract your quads by gently pressing your thighbones down into the floor.
sentences.chinese: 通过轻轻地将大腿骨压向地面来收缩股四头肌。

sentences.english: Pressure on the underside of the thighs from an incorrect (too high) seat position makes this worse.
sentences.chinese: 对大腿下面施加压力的不正确坐姿会使情况更糟。

sentences.english: The injury is high up on his thigh but I think it is short-term.
sentences.chinese: 他的大腿上方受伤，但我认为这只是一个短期伤病。

sentences.english: Abraham makes his servant put his hand under his thigh while swearing to God.
sentences.chinese: 亚伯拉罕让他的仆人把手放在他的大腿下向上帝发誓。

sentences.english: Then lengthen your tailbone and sacrum as your thighbones descend toward your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 然后，拉伸你的尾骨和骶骨，大腿骨沉向腿筋。

sentences.english: Right-back Jerez also has problems with his thigh after recovering from tendon inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 右后卫赫雷斯在肌腱发炎恢复后，大腿仍有一些问题。

sentences.english: She cushioned the baby 's head in her lap.
sentences.chinese: 她让婴儿的头部枕在自己大腿上。

sentences.english: Physical or compare the average, that is, fat thighs, how to lean on?
sentences.chinese: 身体还是比拟平均，就是大腿很胖，怎样能瘦下去呢？

sentences.english: In my thigh and buttock ( touches his right buttock ).
Shooting pains were assailing my arms and chest, and the muscles in my legs were joining in.
sentences.chinese: 胳膊和胸部的疼痛一阵阵袭来，然后是大腿。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
